snippet: Charles T. Munger, the vice chairman of Berkshire Hathaway and longtime business partner of Warren E. Buffett, has made a $110 million gift to the University of Michigan, the largest donation in the school’s history.
abstract: Charles T. Munger, the vice chairman of Berkshire Hathaway and longtime business partner of Warren E. Buffett, has made a $110 million gift to the University of Michigan, the largest donation in the school’s history.

headline.main: Munger Pledges $110 Million to the University of Michigan
